magpie.data

Class BaseEntry

  • java.lang.Object
    • magpie.data.BaseEntry
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Comparable, java.util.Comparator
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MultiPropertyEntry

    public class BaseEntry
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Serializable, java.util.Comparator, java.lang.Comparable
    This class is designed to store all information related to an entry in a Dataset
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      BaseEntry()

      BaseEntry(java.lang.String input)
      Generate an entry by parsing a text string

        public void addAttributes(double[] attributes)

        Parameters:
        attributes - List of attribute values to be added

      • clone

        public BaseEntry clone()
        Generates a clone of an entry. It creates a new list to store the attributes. So, the attribute data is preserved, but you can change the list as desired.
        Overrides:
        clone in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        Clone
